title: Two Major Announcements
description:
Kirk makes two big announcements to start the show (00:01:30). Linda Marks sent us her pandemic song, so fine... We'll play it (00:22:00). Rich from Toucher and Rich thinks that Louis CK may have stolen his take on Good Will Hunting for his comedy special (00:42:30). We reach out to the Mayor of Magnolia to let her know we're coming in April 2022 (01:14:00) & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
